description.translate: Undying as the will of the honourable soldier must be.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Plastron impeccable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Inébranlable comme doit être\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la volonté du digne soldat.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Undying as the will of\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the honourable soldier must be.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
